registrationInfo.description: Information regarding the license described in a PAL database record

___registrationDate.description: Date of licensee FCC registration in UTC using the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ as defined by RFC-3339

___callSign.description: call sign of the licensee (as assigned by FCC)

___licenseConditions.description: Human-readable string or reference annotating the certification

description: PAL record parameters from WINNF-TS-0245 Version V1.0.0

licenseInfo.description: Information regarding the license described in a PAL database record

___licenseFrequencyChannelId.description: FCC-supplied identifier for the frequency channel for the PAL

___licenseAreaExtent.description: Reference to a record in a geographical database represented as a SAS-SAS Zone record providing the extents of the license area. (e.g. “zone/census_tract/census/$YEAR/$FIPS”)

___licenseAreaIdentifier.description: Human-readable string or reference denoting the license area (e.g. FIPS census tract code)

___licenseDate.description: Start date of the license period in UTC using the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ as defined by RFC-3339

___licenseExpiration.description: Expiration date of the license period in UTC using the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ as defined by RFC-3339

$eref.description: Describes a frequency range. The range is provided as a pair of numbers which describe the bounding values of the range.

___lowFrequency.description: The lower frequency of the range in Hz.

___highFrequency.description: The higher frequency of the range in Hz. Must be greater than lowFrequency.

$eref.description: Describes a frequency range. The range is provided as a pair of numbers which describe the bounding values of the range.

___lowFrequency.description: The lower frequency of the range in Hz.

___highFrequency.description: The higher frequency of the range in Hz. Must be greater than lowFrequency.

___palId.description: PAL-ID of this PAL database record. Format: pal/$MO-$YEAR/$FIPS/$CHANNEL

$eref.description: Information regarding the license described in a PAL database record

___licenseFrequencyChannelId.description: FCC-supplied identifier for the frequency channel for the PAL

___licenseAreaExtent.description: Reference to a record in a geographical database represented as a SAS-SAS Zone record providing the extents of the license area. (e.g. “zone/census_tract/census/$YEAR/$FIPS”)

___licenseAreaIdentifier.description: Human-readable string or reference denoting the license area (e.g. FIPS census tract code)

___licenseDate.description: Start date of the license period in UTC using the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ as defined by RFC-3339

___licenseExpiration.description: Expiration date of the license period in UTC using the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ as defined by RFC-3339

___userId.description: User Identifier (UR-ID) of the PAL licensee. This is used by CBSDs requesting PAL spectrum grants from SAS to identify which PAL licensee they are operated by

$eref.description: Information regarding the license described in a PAL database record

___registrationDate.description: Date of licensee FCC registration in UTC using the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ as defined by RFC-3339

___callSign.description: call sign of the licensee (as assigned by FCC)

___licenseConditions.description: Human-readable string or reference annotating the certification

___licensee.description: Human-readable name of the PAL licensee
